main.name: St Josephs Manor Assisted Living
main.title: St. Joseph's Manor HFA
main.header-text: BEST SENIOR LIVING FACILITIES DETROIT ROCHESTER
main.bio: Allied Home Health Care and Nursing Services, LLC is our on site Home Health Care Agency that offers Nursing Services, Physical Therapy, Occupational Therapy, Speech Therapy, Medical Social Services, Home Health Aides and Medical Supplies

services.name: St. Joseph Manor's priority is always the safety of our residents and staff.
All utilities are included except cable and telephone.

care_options.name: Independent Plus
descriptions: Residents at this level are functionally independent or require minimal assistance with mobility, dressing, grooming and bathing and are mentally alert.

They may need nutritious meals (including a special diet), assistance with housekeeping and/or laundry and the stimulation or security of not living alone. 5 or less medications are administered by St. Joseph Staff

care_options.name: Assisted Care.
descriptions: Resident’s needs at this level are the same as for level I, but require additional staff assistance.

Medications may require special monitoring (i.e. blood work). Minimal assistance is required with one or more activities of daily living such as bathing, grooming, toileting, ambulation, transfers, eating, etc.

care_options.name: Supportive Care
descriptions: Residents at this level need 24-hour staff availability and may need involvement of mental health or other professionals to accommodate their needs.
Residents at this level require significant daily assistance with one or more of the following.
⭐️   Cueing to meals and or assistance with eating

care_options.name: Total Care.
descriptions: Residents at this level of care are the same as Level III with the exception that the Resident is totally dependent on St. Joseph’s Staff for their daily living needs.

about: Serving the Detroit Community for over 50 years, St. Joseph Manor is an assisted living facility with accommodations that seek to enhance the quality of life for its residents.
St. Joseph Manor is located near Beaumont Grosse Pointe Hospital & St. John's Hospital. It's spacious and peaceful setting is conducive to a harmonious way of life.
St. Joseph Manor is licensed by the State of Michigan.
St. Joseph Manor's trained, professional staff serves the physical, mental, spiritual and emotional well-being of its residents.
St. Joseph Manor does not discriminate in regards to religion, disability, color or national origin.
All faiths are welcome to worship at St. Joseph Manor.
The beautiful chapel provides a wonderful spiritual atmosphere for those intimate moments with God.

respite-care.description: Respite care is available to people in need of 24-hour nursing care, Alzheimer’s care, or Hospice care. Our daily rate for respite care includes a private studio suite for your loved one with affordable rates based on the level of care needed. Respite care provides the caregiver the opportunity to take a break from the responsibility of care giving, knowing that the resident will be well taken care of in a secure and nurturing environment.
services: Three healthy and delicious meals per day
